dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Kind (for himself and Mr. Kelly of Pennsylvania) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend qualified zone academy bonds for 4 years and to reduce the private business contribution requirement with respect to such bonds.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Investing in 21st Century Schools Act.

section.header: Extension and modification of qualified zone academy bonds

subsection.text: Section 54E(c)(1) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking and 2016 and inserting 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, and 2020.

subsection.header: Reduction of private business contribution requirement
subsection.text: Section 54E(b) of such Code is amended by striking 10 percent and inserting 5 percent.
The amendments made by this section shall apply to obligations issued after the date of the enactment of this Act.
